news.title: Boy, 10, dead as nine in hospital after coach crash
news.summary: The coach carrying Minehead Middle School pupils and staff crashed on Exmoor on Thursday.

news.title: Man accused of airport assault 'didn't know' he hit female PCs
news.summary: Mohammed Amaaz tells jurors he was acting in self-defence when he struck out at three officers.

news.title: Amber weather warning issued as thunderstorms and flooding to cause significant disruption
news.summary: The Met Office has issued an amber warning for thunderstorms and flooding for Saturday morning with disruption expected.

news.title: Police drop investigation into Kneecap's Glastonbury performance
news.summary: Police said there was "insufficient evidence" for a "realistic prospect of conviction of any offence".

news.title: More than 30 poisoned after suspected fake Botox
news.summary: Health security body UKSHA urges vigilance after 38 cases of botulism recorded in the east and north-east of England.

news.title: UK's asylum hotel bill down 30%, government says
news.summary: The Home Office's annual accounts show Â£2.1bn was spent on hotel accommodation in the year to March 2025.

news.title: Serious pollution incidents by water companies up 60%
news.summary: Last year saw record levels of pollution incidents in England, such as the release of untreated sewage, the Environment Agency says.

news.title: UN says it has credible reports of summary executions during Syria fighting
news.summary: The UN human rights chief says those responsible for violations and abuses "must be held to account.

news.title: Lawyers for nurse in trans case criticise 'irresponsible' health board
news.summary: NHS Fife health board published a document online while evidence was being heard in a case brought by nurse Sandie Peggie.

news.title: Kill Russian soldiers, win points: Is Ukraine's new drone scheme gamifying war?
news.summary: The scheme allows Ukrainian troops to trade videos of confirmed kills on the battlefield for prizes.
